items.content_html: This lightweight application mirrors the intuitive UI of YouTube, allowing users to effortlessly search and play videos. With a focus on user experience, the project provides a familiar environment for discovering and enjoying multimedia content.

items.content_html: Pixelblok Blog: A lightweight blog site built with Next.js 13, featuring smooth navigation using the App Router, and content management powered by Storyblok. Explore the world of pixel art and creative storytelling with this fast and responsive web application.
